description: Try our easy to follow Corn Fritters With Avocado Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury fritter,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Christmas,Tomato,Video,Low sugar,Avocado
name: Corn Fritters With Avocado Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs stock powder salt reduced chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Make avocado salsa by placing avocado, onion and tomato in a bowl. Pour over lime juice, toss to combine. Set aside.

Combine flour and stock powder in a large mixing bowl. Make a well in the centre. Combine eggs and milk in a jug. Stir in corn and chives. Make a well in the centre of flour mixture. Pour in egg mixture and stir until combined.

Heat a little oil in a large nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Pour four 1/4-cup (60ml) portions of corn mixture around the pan, allowing room for spreading. Cook for 1-2 mins each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate, cover to keep warm. Repeat, in batches, with remaining corn mixture. Serve with avocado salsa.
